mapper.update: update site_compaction_num set site_id=#{siteid},batch_id=#{batchid}, road_roller_name=#{roadrollername},edit_user_id=#{edituserid}, edit_datetime=#{editdatetime}, compaction_num=#{compactionnum} where id=#{id}
update site_compaction_num set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT scn.*,sfm.fl_name,bm.batch,srm.road_name,srm.road_no,uu.u_name,sc.site_number,srm.road_id FROM site_compaction_num scn LEFT JOIN batch_mgt bm ON scn.batch_id = bm.id and bm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON sfm.fl_id= bm.pitch_type and sfm.delete_state != 0 left JOIN (SELECT * from site_construction sc WHERE sc.delete_state!=0) sc on sc.id=scn.site_id and sc.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm ON srm.road_id=sc.road_id AND srm.delete_state!= 0 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id= scn.edit_user_id and uu.delete_state != 0 where scn.delete_state!=0 and sc.id=scn.site_id ORDER BY scn.datetime desc

SELECT scn.*,sfm.fl_name,bm.batch,srm.road_name,srm.road_no,uu.u_name,sc.site_number,srm.road_id FROM site_compaction_num scn LEFT JOIN batch_mgt bm ON scn.batch_id = bm.id and bm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON sfm.fl_id= bm.pitch_type and sfm.delete_state != 0 left JOIN site_construction sc on sc.id=scn.site_id and sc.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm ON srm.road_id=sc.road_id AND srm.delete_state!= 0 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id= scn.edit_user_id and uu.delete_state != 0 where scn.delete_state!=0 and scn.site_id IN (SELECT id from site_construction sc2 where sc2.road_id=#{roadId} AND sc2.delete_state!=0)
